EmailEngine - class com.topcoder.message.email.EmailEngine.
The EmailEngine class is responsible for sending email.
EmailEngine() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.message.email.EmailEngine
the default ctor.
EmailEngine.AttachmentDataSource - class com.topcoder.message.email.EmailEngine.AttachmentDataSource.
AttachmentDataSource class implements DataSource to be wrapped with a DataHandler for the creation of MimeBodyPart instances to add into the Multipart instance that make up the body of the MimeMessage.
EmailEngine.AttachmentDataSource(InputStream, String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.message.email.EmailEngine.AttachmentDataSource
The constuctor extracts the raw bytes from the given InputStream and finds the MIME type of the attachment.
